enumeratedValue.name: 0b0000
enumeratedValue.description: Select LLWU_P0 for filter

enumeratedValue.description: Select LLWU_P15 for filter

enumeratedValue.name: 0b00
enumeratedValue.description: Filter disabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: Filter posedge detect enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
enumeratedValue.description: Filter negedge detect enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b11
enumeratedValue.description: Filter any edge detect enabled

enumeratedValue.description: Pin Filter 1 was not a wakeup source

enumeratedValue.description: Filter not enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Filter enabled

enumeratedValue.description: RESET pin not enabled as a leakage mode exit source

enumeratedValue.description: RESET pin enabled as a low leakage mode exit source
